p: Adenoviruses undergo a maturation process that involves processing of six structural components of the core and one non-structural precursor that initiates replication of gDNA ( Gaba et al., 2017). One interesting feature of adenoviral maturation is that DNA is required as a co-factor for protease activity. This means that maturation occurs only in particles that have packaged gDNA ( Mangel and San Mart√≠n, 2014).
